positions.title: Vice President - Client Advisory
positions.description_html:
In my role as Vice President of Client Advisory at INDmoney, I orchestrated a multifaceted strategy to revolutionize our approach to client services and engagement, and significantly accelerate our growth.

Key achievements include:

-> Empowering Teams: Built, trained, and led diverse teams (Family Office Manager, Digital Sales, Customer Success, Research & Advisory), optimizing workflows, driving rapid upskilling, and ensuring superior client service delivery.

-> Driving Digital Transformation: Launched a digital subscription business, initiated engaging communication channels, and digitized transactions in alternative products, significantly modernizing our wealth management services.

-> Client-Centric Approach: Led the acquisition and management of high-net-worth clients, enhanced user retention through personalized client services, and resolved client queries swiftly, enhancing customer satisfaction.

-> Strategic Alliances: Forged and managed strategic partnerships with PMS, AIFs, and distributor houses, ensuring smooth transaction processing and enriching our product catalog.

-> Content & Research Excellence: Enhanced research content quality, initiated bond payment due advisory, and created engaging and original content, strengthening our advisory credibility and user engagement.

My tenure at INDmoney was marked by proactive leadership, strategic decision-making, and a strong commitment to client satisfaction, leveraging my comprehensive understanding of financial services.
